color.comment: Color of interactive color on dark background e.g. buttons

color.name: made-color-action-on-dark-hover

color.name: made-color-action-on-dark-active
color.comment: Text color of secondary interactive color on dark background e.g. buttons.

color.name: made-color-action-disabled
color.comment: Global color for disabled state.

color.comment: Background color for selected state of UI Elements such as tables, dropdowns...

color.comment: Background color for hover state of UI Elements such as tables, dropdowns...

color.comment: Outline color for focus state.

color.comment: Text color on top of interactive color on a dark background

color.comment: Text color on top of disabled state color

color.name: made-color-background-default

color.comment: Used on background of breadcrumb and pill components.
